meaningMnemonic:
Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>belong</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to belong to</vocabulary>.

属する is a formal term for describing someone or something’s belonging to or being part of a group, category or classification.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the one you learned with the kanji. This kanji is going <vocabulary>to belong to</vocabulary> you.
